NOW Weather, Just Released!

NOW Weather, Just Released!

blog - August 28, 2013

Great news! NOW Weather has just been released and can be downloaded in the App Store!

If you don’t already know, NOW Weather is a beautiful app showing all the weather information you care about, at a glance.

If you want to learn more about NOW Weather, check out the product page or our introductory blog post.

NOW Weather is exactly what you are looking for in a weather app. Give it a shot to replace your current weather app, and you won’t look back.

Get NOW Weather in the App Store! Just $1.99!
